analysis.key_quote: Such a move will only serve to put us back in the spoils system of the past, with politically motivated hiring and firing based on the degree of patronage and obedience displayed to the current administration.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about reverting to a spoils system, which undermines merit-based hiring and promotes politicization of the civil service, thus eroding public trust in government.
